comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: There's a lot of controversy about this and it's impossible to say unequivocally how the price of ETH will behave after the transition to PoS. It will be as the community and investors will decide. But there is also a common opinion, that the transition to PoS won't happen for a long time, it will be a long story. Also, we can't rule out a split in the community and the formation of a hardfork, where there will be PoW ETH and PoS ETH. There is a huge investment in ETH mining and it will not end that easily.
